channel.title: Help mass clicking
channel.description: could someone help me I am using pimpscape and I would like to take out the mass clicking. plz help

item.title: Help mass clicking
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

rukan85:

cant stop mass clicking u can get this mass clicker detector thing and see how many times a person clicks in like 5 sec… but other then banning peeps u really cant stop it =(

Ip banning can ;)[br][size=1]Posted on: April 11, 2007, 08:17:58 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Play N Skillz, post:3, topic:78692”]You can only stop them from receiving XP from mass-clicking from my knowledge.[/quote]
yes but if they dont get xp they wont think there clicking fast enough and do it even faster then they’ll lagg your server then possibly crash it.

Read full topic
